private/tools

Procs

proc albumAddTags(fm: AsyncLastFM; album, artist: string;
                  tags: AtMost[10, string]): Future[JsonNode]
Breakout of Album.addTags. tags is of type AtMost[10, string], which is any array of strings with length <= 10. Returns the JsonNode of the contents of the response.   Source   Edit 
proc albumAddTags(fm: SyncLastFM; album, artist: string;
                  tags: AtMost[10, string]): JsonNode

Breakout of Album.getTags. This version of the function may be used for both unauthenticated and authenticated sessions, and thus requires that a user parameter be specified. Returns the JsonNode of the contents of the response.   Source   Edit

Breakout of Album.getTags. This version of the function can only be used with an authenticated Last.FM session. Returns the JsonNode of the contents of the response.   Source   Edit
